ygData.subject: Re: Problem with Anthem de Arms?
ygData.msgSnippet: Jonthan s speeds me up fine, however.  Odd. ) I don t mind not speeding up my attacks in a group.  Helps keep the mobs off of me, for once. ) ... the ... any
ygData.messageBody:
Jonthan's speeds me up fine, however. Odd. )

I don't mind not speeding up my attacks in a group. Helps keep the mobs off
of me, for once. )

> I think you've hit upon it. It coule be that since the weapon can have
the
> effect of Haste, and since that song doesn't seem to like to stick with
any
> other Haste type effects/spells/songs, that even though the charges are
> used, this weapon will not be sped up, except with its own haste charge.
>
> Just a guess, though.
>
> Anthem Dirgemaker
> Level 40 Bard of Qeynos
> Solusek Ro
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
